overview.currency_exchange_rules: Strong Swiss Franc may impact currency conversions.

personal_income_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Yes, may be eligible for tax credit.
personal_income_tax.exemptions: Standard deductions and allowances vary by canton.
personal_income_tax.social_security: Variable depending on canton and income (approx. 6-10%).

corporate_tax.rate: 8.5% on net profits at federal level, cantonal and municipal taxes vary.
corporate_tax.small_business_rate: Reduced rates may be available for small businesses in certain cantons.
corporate_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Yes, may be eligible for tax credit.

withholding_taxes.interest: 35% (reduced rates for certain types of interest).
withholding_taxes.royalties: 0% (if recipient is not resident in a low-tax jurisdiction).

corporate_tax.deductions: Standard deductions and allowances, including R&D expenses and depreciation.

capital_gains_tax.rate: Federal capital gains tax not levied. Cantonal taxes vary, generally between 5-20%.
capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of private assets may be exempt.

vat_gst.reduced_rate: 2.5% on essential items and tourist services.

property_tax.exemptions: Primary residence may be eligible for exemptions or reduced rates.

inheritance_tax.rate: Federal inheritance tax abolished in 2007. Cantonal taxes vary.
inheritance_tax.exemptions: Spouse, descendants, and certain charitable organizations.

wealth_tax.rate: Federal wealth tax abolished in 1999. Cantonal wealth taxes vary.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and dividends.
Avoids double taxation on income and inheritance.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

crypto_tax.income_tax_rate: Income from crypto activities subject to personal income tax rates.
crypto_tax.capital_gains_rate: Capital gains from cryptocurrencies typically taxed at capital gains rates.
crypto_tax.mining_tax: Taxed as business income or capital gains, depending on circumstances.

nft_tax.income_tax_rate: Income from NFT sales subject to personal income tax rates.
nft_tax.capital_gains_rate: Capital gains from NFTs taxed at capital gains rates.

additional_notes.political_risks: Politically stable with a strong legal system.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Strong and stable economy, but vulnerable to global economic fluctuations.
additional_notes.legal_system: Well-developed legal system with clear tax regulations.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 3rd in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
